string-array.name: about
string-array.item: This application converts from a given numeral system (from binary to hexadecimal) in the other. It\'s possible to convert the positive and negative integers and floating point numbers.
The entering of number and its editing is done by using the buttons which are located at the bottom of the application.
The selecting of convertible system is done through the context menu, which is located in the upper part of application, or the appropriate item of menu \"System\".

Item of menu \"Mode\" contains two options: \"Standard\" and \"Advanced\". Standard mode converts into four standard notations: binary, octal, decimal and hexadecimal. Advanced mode converts into all other notations. By default, the application activates the standard mode.

In the item of menu \"Language\" you can choose the necessary language. The application is translated into 9 languages: Belarusian, English, German, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian.
